body.bibl: Tamcke, Martin. “‘Show Me in the Law’: The Use of the Argument of the Law (Torah) in the Dispute between the Muslim Emir and the Patriarch Yuhannon.” In The Challenge of the Mosaic Torah in Judaism, Christianity, and Islam, edited by Antti Laato, 219–27.
